name: Return of the Cyrus Cylinder
storyline: Maziar is a talented and capable man; An Iranian who wants to defend his ancient identity and culture with his teeth. In the game "Return" you will be accompanied by the dangers of this brave man to defend his ancient identity and nationality. With the help of his longtime friend Jamshid, he wants to prevent his country's valuable antiquities from being stolen by smugglers and to achieve this goal he has to enter environments such as native forests, historic cities and ancient sites such as the historic Bam Citadel. Armed conflict and risk his life to save his national identity.
summary: This is a third person action game made with UDK engine. Maziar is a talented and capable man; An Iranian who wants to defend his ancient identity and culture with his teeth. In the game "Return" you will be accompanied by the dangers of this brave man to defend his ancient identity and nationality. With the help of his longtime friend Jamshid, he wants to prevent his country's valuable antiquities from being stolen by smugglers and to achieve this goal he has to enter environments such as native forests, historic cities and ancient sites such as the historic Bam Citadel. Armed conflict and risk his life to save his national identity.
